data.title: Football Club History Database
data.text:
ASTON VILLA

1886-87 F.A. Cup Winners 1888-89 Founder member of the Football League Football League runner-up 1891-92 F.A. Cup runner-up 1893-94 Football League Champions 1894-95 F.A. Cup Winners (2nd time) 1895-96 Football League Champions (2nd time) 1896-97 Football League Champions (3rd time) F.A. Cup Winners (3rd time) 1898-99 Football League Champions (4th time) 1899-00 Football League Champions (5th time) 1900-01 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1902-03 Football League runner-up F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1904-05 F.A. Cup Winners (4th time) 1907-08 Football League runner-up 1909-10 Football League Champions (6th time) 1910-11 Football League runner-up 1912-13 Football League runner-up F.A. Cup Winners (5th time) 1913-14 Football League runner-up F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1919-20 F.A. Cup Winners (6th time) 1923-24 F.A. Cup runner-up 1928-29 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1930-31 Football League runner-up 1932-33 Football League runner-up 1933-34 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1936 Relegated to Division Two 1937-38 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1939-40 Football League programme abandoned due to outbreak of war 1940-41 Joined Birmingham & District League for wartime competition, playing their first team, unlike WBA and Birmingham 1941-42 Birmingham & District League Champions 1956 Escaped relegation to Division Two only on goal average 1956-57 F.A. Cup Winners (7th time) 1958-59 F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1959 Relegated to Division Two 1959-60 Football League Division Two Champions Promoted to Division One F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1960-61 Inaugural Football League Cup winners 1962-63 Football League Cup runner-up 1964-65 Football League Cup semi-finalists 1967 Relegated to Division Two 1970 Relegated to Division Three 1970-71 Football League Cup runner-up 1971-72 Football League Division Three Champions Promoted to Division Two 1974-75 Football League Division Two runner-up Promoted to Division One Football League Cup Winners (2nd time) 1976-77 Football League Cup Winners (3rd time) 1977-78 UEFA Cup Quarter Finalists 1980-81 Football League Champions (7th time) 1981-82 European Cup Winners 1982-83 European Cup Quarter Finalists 1983-84 Football League Cup semi-finalists 1985-86 Football League Cup semi-finalists 1987 Relegated to Division Two 1987-88 Football League Division Two runner-up and promoted to Division One on goal difference 1989 Escaped relegation by goal difference 1989-90 Football League runner-up 1992-93 Founder members of FA Premier League F A Premier League runner-up 1993-94 Football League Cup Winners (4th time) 1995-96 Football League Cup Winners (5th time) F.A. Cup semi-finalists 1997-98 UEFA Cup Quarter Finalists 1999-00 Football League Cup semi-finalists F.A. Cup runner-up 2003-04 Football League Cup semi-finalists 2009-10 F.A. Cup semi-finalists Football League Cup runner-up 2012-13 Football League Cup semi-finalists 2014-15 F.A. Cup runner-up 2016 Relegated to English Football League (ex-Football League) 2017-18 Not promoted after play-offs (SF Middlesbrough 0 Aston Villa 1, Aston Villa 0 Middlesbrough 0 - Agg 0-1, F Fulham 1 Aston Villa 0 @ Wembley Stadium) 2018-19 Promoted to Premier League after play-offs (SF Aston Villa 2 West Bromwich Albion 1, West Bromwich Albion 1 Aston Villa 0 - Agg 2-2, Aston Villa won 4-3 on
